[Desc]               <blue>Standing before you is Bernie Thoreau, self-titled slacker and proud. He slouches towards you, hands in his ratty jeans, looking bored to be here already. He gives you a weird look, shrugs, and gets into the game... but not before another person comes over to him. Wait, are you facing off against two people at once?? As if sensing your concern, the host interjects. "Yes, he's allowed to stay, so long as he doesn't help with rounds or explain the changes to Bernie. Isn't that right, Bob?" Bob nods and punches his friend's shoulder playfully. "Come on, man. You've got this in the bag!"</blue>;
[LoseDesc]               <pink>What now stands before you is a sexy, if slightly slutty girl with her boyfriend. She prepares for the next round, before the host stops her, telling her that she already lost. Disappointed, but not crestfallen, she looks over to her boyfriend. "At least now we can play a much more fun game, right Bobby?" He gives you a look of surprise as he is dragged off the stage. You see Bob a couple of days later, who thanks you for winning. Apparently he hasn't gotten any sleep from how much sex he's been having, and they're already talking wedding plans. Guess this was a win for all people involved!</pink>;
